eventDecorators.name: DataReceiverSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subgraph version is updated.

eventDecorators.name: InitialCardinalitySet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subgraph version is updated.

eventDecorators.name: OracleDeployed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subgraph version is updated.

eventDecorators.name: PendingGovernorAccepted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new governor is set. Emitted when a subgraph version is updated.

eventDecorators.name: PendingGovernorSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new pending governor is set. Emitted when a subgraph version is updated.

functionDecorators.name: acceptPendingGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Allows a proposed governor to accept the governance.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenA
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of either token0 or token1.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenB
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of the other token.

parameterDecorators.name: _fee
parameterDecorators.description: The fee denominated in hundredths of a bip.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenA
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of either token0 or token1.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenB
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of the other token.

parameterDecorators.name: _fee
parameterDecorators.description: The fee denominated in hundredths of a bip.

functionDecorators.name: setDataReceiver
functionDecorators.description: Allows governor to set a new allowed dataReceiver. Will disallow the previous dataReceiver.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new allowed dataReceiver.

functionDecorators.name: setInitialCardinality
functionDecorators.description: Allows governor to set a new initial cardinality for new oracles.

parameterDecorators.name: _initialCardinality
parameterDecorators.description: The initial size of the observations memory storage for newly deployed pools.

functionDecorators.name: setPendingGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Allows a governor to propose a new governor.

parameterDecorators.name: _pendingGovernor
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the proposed new governor.
